key_points: CNN announced the immediate termination of anchor Chris Cuomo following an external review by a law firm.
The review related to Cuomo's involvement in his brother, former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo's, defense against sexual harassment accusations.
CNN had suspended Chris Cuomo indefinitely earlier in the week before deciding on termination.
Michael Smerconish will host Cuomo's former 9 p.m. Eastern time slot temporarily.
CNN stated the termination was due to new information about Cuomo's involvement with his brother's defense.
Following his termination, a lawyer revealed a new sexual misconduct allegation against Chris Cuomo from a former junior colleague at another network.
The documents released by New York Attorney General Letitia James showed Chris Cuomo's deep involvement in advising his brother amid the scandal.
Chris Cuomo has stated he never reported on the scandal or interfered with CNNâ€™s coverage of it.
Internal backlash at CNN grew against Cuomo following the release of the documents detailing his involvement.
CNN emphasized Cuomo's termination was due to a breach of their standards, prompted by the findings of the external review.
